document_data.name: Green Imsa
document_data.mainbody: '''Green Imsa''' was a traveler just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Imsa was a quiet and friendly individual. She became frustrated if people bothered her about her condition.
document_data.History: Imsa was a [[human]] who was afflicted with an unknown condition that turned her skin, eyes, hair, teeth, and nails green. At the start of the Tyranny of Dragons,inÂ [[1489 DR]] Imsa sought to travel to [[Waterdeep]] in search of a cure for herself. She boarded a great caravan, which unknown to her was full of [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
